A

acceptEvent(eventId, verifiedPlaceId) - Static method in class io.radar.sdk.Radar
Accepts an event. Events can be accepted after user check-ins or other forms of verification. Event verifications will be used to improve the accuracy and confidence level of future events. See https://radar.io/documentation/sdk#android-verify.
ACTION_RECEIVED - Static variable in class io.radar.sdk.RadarReceiver
 
autocomplete(query, near, limit, callback) - Static method in class io.radar.sdk.Radar
Autocompletes partial addresses and place names, sorted by relevance.

CONTINUOUS - Static variable in class io.radar.sdk.RadarTrackingOptions
A preset that updates every 30 seconds and syncs all location updates to the server.
copy(desiredStoppedUpdateInterval, fastestStoppedUpdateInterval, desiredMovingUpdateInterval, fastestMovingUpdateInterval, desiredSyncInterval, desiredAccuracy, stopDuration, stopDistance, startTrackingAfter, stopTrackingAfter, replay, sync, useStoppedGeofence, stoppedGeofenceRadius, useMovingGeofence, movingGeofenceRadius) - Method in class io.radar.sdk.RadarTrackingOptions
An options class used to configure background tracking.

E

EFFICIENT - Static variable in class io.radar.sdk.RadarTrackingOptions
A preset that updates as fast as every 6 minutes while moving, periodically when stopped, and only syncs stops and exits to the server. The default, lowest battery usage and will not exceed Android vitals bad behavior thresholds.
equals(p) - Method in class io.radar.sdk.RadarTrackingOptions

initialize(context, publishableKey) - Static method in class io.radar.sdk.Radar

onClientLocationUpdated(context, location, stopped, source) - Method in class io.radar.sdk.RadarReceiver
Tells the receiver that client's location was updated but not necessarily synced to the server. To receive server-synced location updates and user state, use RadarReceiver.onLocationUpdated instead.

Called when a geofence search request succeeds, fails, or times out. Receives the request status and, if successful, the location and an array of geofences sorted by distance.

rejectEvent(eventId) - Static method in class io.radar.sdk.Radar
Rejects an event. Events can be accepted after user check-ins or other forms of verification. Event verifications will be used to improve the accuracy and confidence level of future events. See https://radar.io/documentation/sdk#android-verify.
RESPONSIVE - Static variable in class io.radar.sdk.RadarTrackingOptions
A preset that updates as fast as every 2.5 minutes while moving, shuts down when stopped, and only syncs stops and exits to the server. Low battery usage, but may exceed Android vitals bad behavior thresholds for excessive wakeups and excessive wi-fi scans. See https://developer.android.com/topic/performance/vitals/wakeup.html and https://developer.android.com/topic/performance/vitals/bg-wifi.html.
reverseGeocode(callback) - Static method in class io.radar.sdk.Radar
Gets the device's current location, then reverse geocodes that location, converting coordinates to address.
